resource_notes: Bi-directional sync logic with conflict resolution is highly complex. Estimate likely optimistic.
alternative_approach: Simplify to read-only offline mode for MVP if timeline slips.
risk_factors: Data consistency bugs, high testing overhead.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate 40% buffer; Pair programming with Backend Lead for API contract.

resource_notes: Requires specific knowledge of ST_Contains and spatial indexing.
alternative_approach: Utilize simple bounding box queries first.
mitigation_strategy: DevOps Engineer to assist with DB tuning/indexing.

resource_notes: Must handle WSS handshake authentication correctly.
risk_factors: Socket connection drops during auth refresh.
mitigation_strategy: Use standard NestJS Guards tailored for WS adapter.
